participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: creative and hands-on, enjoys nature and has a sensitive side due to past experiences.
participant_1.background: i enjoy working with my hands and love gardening. i just got a job working in a gas station. i was adopted at a young age to an older couple. i am terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma. my father keeps trying to set me up on blind dates.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: energetic and playful, enjoys gaming and has a quirky sense of humor.
participant_2.background: i play a lot of call of duty. my favorite band is the insane clown posse. i like donuts. i drive a ford pinto. on weekends i do live action roleplaying events.
